name: Colorful Complications
description:
Mini Game Jam 73 Submission

Play as a small ghost working overtime. Complications arise after your coworkers leave, hopefully they will be back soon...

Controls:

Controls
Use arrow keys/wasd for movement

Press Space to dash! Be careful not to crash into anything!

Right click to change change the color of your paintball gun

Press escape to pause!

Credits

Programming: Filip Karlsson & Riccardo Romio

Art & Design: Angelina Feng & Larry Xue

Music provided by: Baris Yamen
